title: Drawing, "Ordulph (Momo) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: E. McKnight Kauffer.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left: Ordulph
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A man, standing frontally, with dark cropped hair, wearing a beige tunic ending in short pants with gray and tan stripes, a black cape draped around his left shoulder; his left hand is raised, and his head is turned to his right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ordulph (Momo) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925.
1925. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-174.
